document.id: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04604
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE AMENDING CHAPTER 5.136 TO INCREASE THE TRANSIENT OCCUPANCY TAX (“TOT”) IMPOSED ON HOTEL ROOMS IN THE UNINCORPORATED AREA OF THE COUNTY FROM A RATE OF TEN PERCENT (10%) TO TWELVE PERCENT (12%) OF THE RENT CHARGED BY THE HOTEL OPERATOR

citations.citation: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04604
